title: 12 years laterReceiving paperwork that they are putting a lien on my house regarding a car that I turned in in 2007?
question: Receiving paperwork that they are putting a lien on my house regarding a car that I turned in in 2007 How do I fight this and who do I
answers:
Once you get the “paperwork” have it reviewed by an attorney.

It is probably an abstract of judgement that was filed a long time ago for the auto deficiency
